sampleDescriptions: Effort to modify proposed regulations from CMS (physician fee schedule and OPPS) in order to have Intensive Cardiac Rehabilitation moved to the Category 3 list so that it may be provided via telehealt

Promote legislative and regulatory methods of ensuring that intensive cardiac rehabilitation and cardiac rehabilitation are permanently permitted in Medicare via telehealth.
